website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural vegan cleanser that aims to combat environmental pollutants.
pros: Leaves skin feeling very refreshed, has a herbal, gingery scent and ingredients like pomegranate and papaya
The cleanser has an oily consistency that keeps moisture in and is good for sensitive skin
Users noted a reduction in pore size and improved overall skin tone
cons: The scent is quite powerful, proving to be too much for some

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE face wash. Crazy price, but completely unique and not comparable to anything else I have seen on the market.
customer_reviews.author: athenasgriffin

customer_reviews.title: Best Skin Care Line Ever!! Number one Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: This the best exfoliating face wash I have ever found!! The exfoliating bits are very fine! Cleaning your pores better and more gently then other products that uses large plastic bits that poison your body and skin!! The cost is totally worth it and I noticed a difference in all Tata Harper products in the first week! It also comes in a glass bottle! So you can use it for something else after!! Don’t question yourself just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rickert

customer_reviews.title: already seeing results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks and I have not had 1 breakout. My skin feels soft and smooth all day long!!!!! LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LetY

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and no big difference
customer_reviews.text: Other then the smell, no big difference from other brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love the cleanser but the plump is not easy to plump. Any way to repair it?
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Edelson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My only suggestion would be for Tata Harper to put it in a pump rather than a tube. When the cleanser is almost gone it is hard to squeeze it out.
customer_reviews.author: lauretta mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash and scrub
customer_reviews.text: Great daily gentle face wash and scrub. First time user and addicted. Great to prevent breakouts and keep a fresh polished shine
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I love this facial was just enough "grit" in it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial was just enough "grit" in it to feel like your exfoliating, but it's not rough and leaves your skin soft and smooth and ready for all your after cleansing products
customer_reviews.author: John Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products!
customer_reviews.text: Tata Harper products are amazing! I have always had problem skin & am very sensitive to chemical ingredients...no problems with these products. I am slowly buying the products I want to try and so far they are great. I wanted something I could carry on an airplane & this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Caparbi Speck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Not for daily use as it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Not for daily use as it would be too much exfoliation but between this one and the refreshing cleanser, you've got yourself a system.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Geneviève

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It makes my skin so soft, seems to make it look more radiant, also! It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: You DO get what you pay for and MORE!
customer_reviews.text: One of the BEST cleansers that I have ever used! The whole Tata Harper line is A+ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and All Natural!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. All natural and it feels refreshing after I was it off. It has been helping a lot with my oily face. The only con is that its quite pricey. But that's due to the all natural! :)
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite products ever! Deliciously natural! The package arrived extremely fast and in perfect conditions. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Sabet

customer_reviews.title: the gold standard for face care
customer_reviews.text: my dtr swears by this stuff and was so happy to receive this among her christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: avid leader

customer_reviews.title: Effective for Sensitive Skin, in a Tube not Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The Rejuvenating Cleanser no longer is in a bottle--it is in a metal tube. Doesn't make a difference to me. The cleanser itself has an amazing exfoliator that does not damage skin, even my sensitive skin. Impressive--cleans well and does not over-dry. Plus, it's made from truly whole ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: PamelaHL

customer_reviews.title: Purchased at Nordstrom do Amazon can’t veriomy ourchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I tried only the cleanser for the first time. It’s Smells good and my skin looks great. However, the price puts me off. If I used all the recommended items for my regime it would be about $200 a month. I’m worth it, but don’t want to spend that much of my budget on skin care. Looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special; dishonest skin line!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find anything unique about this cleanser. I guess I expected a lot due to the price...? But nothing special here. NOT worth the inflated price, that's for sure. MOST IMPORTANTLY to me, however, is the fact that I left a negative 1-star review on Tata Harper's website regarding this product, and that review lasted about 20 seconds before it was taken off like it never existed. SO BEWARE. ALL those positive reviews are there on her site bc they remove anything negative!! And WOW, does that ever say something to me about the fact that they have something to hide!!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnML

customer_reviews.title: I love Tata Harper products this in combination with her other ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Tata Harper products this in combination with her other products and you're left with baby butt skin. I would get compliments on my scent and glow often! My only complaint is the shelf life and clogging as it does clog often and the product smells weird towards the end of its life (4-6 months) I recommend storing in a dark cool place but I personally just miss the foil tubes it originally was packaged in!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Steven

product_meta.title: Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser, 125 ml/4.1 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
This creamy cleanser is your daily exfoliating treatment. Our best selling cleanser provides gentle physical and chemical exfoliation with apricot microspheres and BHA from white willow bark to give you a healthy looking, radiant glow. This award winning formula buffs and polishes with 4 sources to dissolve buildup, 4 sources to refine pores, and 8 sources of plumping hydration. Recommended for oily, combination, dry, or normal skin types. 

How to Use: 
For best results, apply to dry skin and massage gently to activate and polish. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use daily AM & PM. 

Tata's Tips:
Apply a generous amount of Regenerating Cleanser to dry skin and polish. Apply an even layer of the Resurfacing Mask on top and leave for 5-10 minutes for a deeper exfoliation treatment. Apply it on dry skin and massage into skin using circular motions, then focus on the highly congested areas during a second buffing cleanse.
feature_bullets: WHAT IT IS: A daily cleansing & exfoliating treatment that buffs and polishes for radiant, healthy looking skin
BENEFITS: Our best selling cleanser provides gentle physical and chemical exfoliation with apricot microspheres and BHA from white willow bark to give you a healthy looking, radiant glow

INGREDIENTS: 16 High-performance botanical ingredients. This award winning formula buffs and polishes with 4 sources to dissolve buildup, 4 sources to refine pores, and 8 sources of plumping hydration

100% NATURAL: 100% natural, nontoxic, and free from all fillers, synthetics, artificial colors and fragrances. Our non-toxic products will never make you choose between health and results or between natural and high-performance

MADE FRESH IN VERMONT: Buying direct from Tata Harper guarantees the most farm fresh, authenticated product online. No outsourcing. No shortcuts. We do it all ourselves. With our own people. On our own farm
